Scale | Backend/Full Stack and Frontend | SF or Remote

Scale is an Accel & Index-backed YC startup that works with a number of computer vision focused companies to accelerate their AI development (to name a few: Alphabet (Google), Zoox, Lyft, Pinterest, Airbnb, nuTonomy). We’ve had phenomenal breakout revenue, raised an $18 MM series B, and are looking to grow our team of 40.

We’re looking for engineers across the stack to work on projects ranging from creating delightful user interfaces to scaling our infrastructure. If you are interested, please apply here:

Backend/Fullstack: https://jobs.lever.co/scaleapi/c1443865-f64e-4467-bfdc-89805...

Frontend: https://jobs.lever.co/scaleapi/9fe1f405-647b-493c-9728-e2c38...
